movie.title: Unbroken
movie.plot: The life of Louis Zamperini, an Olympic athlete who joined the armed forces during the second world war. Only to be captured by the Japanese navy after a plane crash in the Pacific. During his capture, Louie must continue his fight by surviving through the war.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 29 nominations.

events.title: Louis Zamperini's plane is damaged during a raid on Nauru
Louis Zamperini's plane crashes in the ocean, and the three surviving crew are stranded in inflatable rafts
Louis Zamperini is taken prisoner by the Japanese
Louis Zamperini comes 8th in the Olympic 5,000m race
